name: Homer's Odyssey
description:
Homer’s Odyssey is an interactive narrative game inspired by one of the classic ancient Greek epic poems written by Homer, mixing gameplay elements from adventure and card game genres.

A timeless classic suitable for everyone, telling the tale of “Odysseus the Cunning”- mastermind behind the Trojan Horse- and his 10-year struggle to return home after the end of the war.

RELIVE THE MYTH:


Experience more than 10 hours of the classic adventure through interactive illustrations, narration, dialogues, music, exploration, voice acting, puzzles and card game duels.

DEFEAT YOUR ENEMIES:


Collect cards, upgrade them and choose your deck to challenge the AI in intense duels.

BE THE PROTAGONIST:


Take on the role of Odysseus, relive the intellectual duels against his enemies and experience unique story-driven card game boss battles.

EXPLORE, LEARN, AND PLAY:


Delve deeper into the lore, interact with objects, illustrations, characters and uncover famous myths as you sail the waters of the Mediterranean Sea.

TRUE TO THE ORIGINAL:


Learn the story of the Odyssey as it was meant to be told through an adaptation that stays true to the original texts in order to maintain the authenticity of this timeless epic tale.
